dialog: there was a witch who lived at the border of our world and the world of the dead.
She used to abduct children by sending her faithful servants the Navs merciless halfbirds, halfhumans.
The Navs lured the children to the witch's den where she devoured their souls.
Parents forgot their children as if they had never existed.
But one boy with a pure and bright soul managed to defeat a witch and imprison her in the world of the dead.
However, the witch didn't give up.
She began to look for someone who would help her get back.
Someone whose pure soul would become darker than night, who can cross the borders of the worlds.
Someone who has already been dead once.
Time passed, and the memories of that witch remained only in fairy tales.
Egor, why are you so late?
You've grown up so fast, baby.
Remember how we used to play?
Has anybody taught you to knock?
What nonsense do you read before bed?
Baby, I don't like moving houses either.
Do you think I don't know what it's like to be a new kid?
Just put it so it doesn't catch the eye, okay?
We'll keep an eye on the nanny.
Why does she need a nanny if she doesn't work?
You're not mature enough to criticize your mother.
Don't you think it's been a while?
What kind of morning is this?
Alexey, I can't take it anymore.
We'll make it this time too.
Eva, what time is the music lesson today?
Your music tutor will be waiting for you at 8 pm.
Is it beneath you to speak to normal people?
Are you out of your mind, freak?
Let's get out of here, guys!
Then why didn't you use it?
Because you got in the way.
I thought we had an agreement no boyfriends.
By the way, my name is Egor.
She can fall down the armchair.
It's not a good idea to put her there on her own.
Egor, why did you put her there?
Have you got nothing better to do?
She was there when I came in.
She's going to look after Varya.
And you too, while she's at it.
Well, I don't need looking after.
He'll get used to me being around.
I always find a way to get through to kids.
Didn't your mother tell you it's rude to spy on people?
You think you sense things that other people don't?
If you ever grow up, that is...
She's with the little one while I'm doing some cleaning.
I'm sorry, we never really had a nanny before.
There's a first time for everything, Alexey.
Real men must stand on their own two feet.
Real men must protect those who are dear to them.
What about you? Do you protect those who are dear to you?
But a brazenfaced nanny in our house seems normal to you?
Let me decide myself what is normal in my house, okay?
Come back here, we're not finished.
Cut it! Do you hear me?
When your mother died, I almost lost my mind.
Hey man, give the ball back.
That's because you watch a lot of basketball before bed.
You, on the other hand, have no worries.
Julia, can you give us a moment, please?
Egor, listen. I'm sick and tired of your drama.
I get it, but mother is dead.
It's time to forget about it.
Protect those who are dear to you, or forget?
It's easier to forget, that's true.
If we can't settle this as friends, we'll do it the hard way.
What the hell is wrong with you?
Who's going to pay for the damaged goods? Me?
I've been paying for you my whole life.
Neither the state nor your mother.
Now run to your moron friends.
We have some business to do.
According to Wikipedia, Claude Debussy is a French composer, a leading representative of...
Did you know that being online for a long time makes you lose touch with the real world.
Why are you always running somewhere?
If you become friendlier, maybe you'll have some friends.
You'll also have some if you learn to make good jokes.
Children aren't allowed in the forest.
If I see you again, I'll tear your head off.
Have you shat your pants and took off?
Mother told me he's an artifact hunter.
He looks for WWII weapons in the forest.
It's better not to mess with him.
My grandma used to say these were used for burning people...
She also said that after their death their souls stayed somewhere near.
Sometimes they can quietly call you by your name.
But if you turn around, they'll take your face away.
Egor, help me get out of here.
The subscriber is currently not reachable. Please try again later.
Shall I stay and wait here with you?
Your lesson with a music tutor starts in 10 minutes.
And all her stuff is gone.
Egor, we still haven't brought all the stuff from the old apartment.
Your daughter has gone missing. She took her.
What? We have to do something, you idiots!
You've forgotten her just like you forgot my mom!
Let me go! Leave me alone!
Stop! Alexey, what are you doing?
Stay here and think for a while.
If you do this again, I'll throw you out of this house.
I'll meet you on the playground in 20 minutes.
Where do you think you're going?
One girl once ran away with a nice boy.
He kept on telling her how beautiful she was.
But in the end, the girl was left with a daughter and an old piano that nobody wants.
Am I paying the tutor for nothing?
I hope I wasn't too hard on him?
He's a smart kid. Why would he dream up an imaginary sister?
I don't know. Maybe he wants a little sister?
Were you serious when you said you would throw him out?
I can't play anymore, I'm tired.
If you dare open it, you'll seriously regret this.
She'll come back. She'll come back.
We have some business to do.
Just go inside and look whether there is somebody.
Why do you need the can?
You think you're the smartest, huh?
Guys, you have to see this.
Has he been spying on us?
We'll get arrested for breaking into a house.
Are you deaf? We asked you a question. Answer it.
She died after our daughter had disappeared.
Kids have been disappearing for a while now, but nobody remembers them.
It seems that even their parents don't need them.
One day I woke up with a feeling that I lost something.
Something important. But I couldn't remember what it was.
There was only a candle burning.
Whenever I looked at the candle, I somehow recalled this old dream that I had almost forgotten.
Electricity â that's how I knew that evil came to the city.
Every time some child disappeared, there had been power cuts in the area.
I began following the kids and taking pictures of them.
Whenever the kid suddenly disappeared from the photo, it meant everyone has forgotten him.
That's how I could track how many children were missing.
I've been trying to find my daughter for many years.
I settled here, in the forest.
But I haven't found anything here except red threads.
But who needs children to be forgotten?
Someone who can easily enter the house.
Are you saying that your wife comes and takes children to the forest?
Your request matches a Slavic demon who lives on the border between the living and the dead  Baba Yaga.
There's nothing to make fun of.
We'll do it on our way back.
Hey! Do you really believe him?
This guy's obviously crazy, but you seem sane.
What do you want? I'm going to get my sister back, do you understand?
We don't need you at all.
You can go if you want.
Where do these ropes come from?
Guys, I found something strange in here!
I haven't seen you for quite some time.
I've had some business to do.
I don't want you to leave ever again.
How could you let him go?
And I'll be always with you.
I thought you came here to look for your sister.
Why did you take her to the forest?
Did you want to have some privacy?
I didn't drag either you or her here.
But you asked us to follow you.
I know where my sister is.
Last time I saw something in here.
Who are you? You have a very distinct smell.
She cried so loudly in the witch's den.
There are scary invisible birds who bring children to her.
They can sense the smell of memories just like predators sense blood.
It's important to keep your brightest memory.
We remain alive as long as we're remembered.
We should get back to the furnace.
The forest is dangerous at night the Navs can catch you.
The cloak will hide your smell.
She is going to wake up now.
So they don't sense our smell.
Egor! Help me get out of here.
What is it? There's nobody there.
The more you resist, the stronger they tighten up.
We can escape while the witch isn't hungry.
This isn't your first time here, is it?
I've escaped from here many times.
While the witch is eating, the others can break away.
There's no passage there, I've tried it many times.
We should go back to my house.
Please, come with us. Your dad is waiting for you.
I told you â there's no way back.
There must be a way out.
You're the one the witch is looking for.
The candle went out. He forgot me.
What are we going to do?
We'll come up with something, okay?
Get out of my house, ragamuffin!
Was that you who broke my window?
How did you get in here?
And one more thing...But it's a secret.
Every night I see this dream about a little crying girl.
If you remember her, she's still alive.
Real men must protect those who are dear to them.
Run, Egor, I can handle him.
I don't understand what's going on.
So what? You're forgotten, but I haven't been noticed my whole life.
Why are you being so limp?
I'm sure your sister's still alive.
We'll come back for her and destroy the furnace, so the kids won't disappear anymore.
We need to figure out how to kill Baba Yaga.
What about a good old way?
I'll teach you to break into my property.
Yes. There's a passage in the furnace.
I would feel it if she died.
It's true, she's gone. I saw it.
Stay here. If I don't come back, burn everything down.
Egor, what took you so long?
You can cross the borders of the worlds.
Now I know it. We can leave this place together.
Give her life to me, so we can be together again.
Our daughter, Tanya! We can save her.
She promised to bring her back...
if I bring her the boy.
He has parents who love him too.
Like you used to love our daughter.
Real men must protect those who are dear to them.
Guys, stop it. Let's take a photo.
Aren't you afraid that your friend will come out?
I have you by my side.
Would you like to join us?
